meanings.definition: A hot pepper of a variety grown in Mexico and the southern United States.
meanings.sent1: I added some jalapin to my salsa for a spicy kick.
meanings.sent2: The jalapin plant in the garden is flourishing under the sun.
meanings.sent3: The jalapin pepper jumped into the pot, eager to spice things up.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like jalapin, leaving a fiery trail in their wake.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of jalapin filled the kitchen, making my mouth water.

meanings.definition: A pungent condiment made from the dried and ground pepper.
meanings.sent1: The chef sprinkled jalapin on top of the dish for added flavor.
meanings.sent2: I love the taste of jalapin on my tacos.
meanings.sent3: The jalapin condiment danced on my taste buds, awakening my senses.
meanings.sent4: His jokes were as sharp as jalapin, leaving us in stitches.
meanings.sent5: The jar of jalapin on the shelf added a pop of color to the kitchen.
